parameters.jsCode:
const code = [
'module.exports = async ({ page, context }) => {',
'  const { targetURL, waitTime } = context;',
'  try {',
'    let capturedData = null;',
'    await page.evaluateOnNewDocument(() => {',
'      window.__turnstileData = null;',
'      Object.defineProperty(window, "turnstile", {',
'        value: new Proxy({}, {',
'          get(target, prop) {',
'            if (prop === "render") {',
'              return function(container, params) {',
'                window.__turnstileData = {',
'                  sitekey: params.sitekey || params["site-key"],',
'                  action: params.action,',
'                  cData: params.cData || params["c-data"],',
'                  chlPageData: params.chlPageData || params["chl-page-data"]',
'                };',
'                return "widget-id";',
'              };',
'            }',
'            return target[prop];',
'          }',
'        }),',
'        configurable: false',
'      });',
'    });',
'    await page.goto(targetURL, { waitUntil: "networkidle2", timeout: 30000 });',
'    await page.waitForTimeout(waitTime);',
'    capturedData = await page.evaluate(() => window.__turnstileData);',
'    if (!capturedData || !capturedData.sitekey) {',
'      const content = await page.content();',
'      const match = content.match(/sitekey[\\\\"\':s]+(6[a-zA-Z0-9_-]{39,})/i);',
'      if (match) capturedData = { sitekey: match[1], action: "login" };',
'    }',
'    if (!capturedData || !capturedData.sitekey) {',
'      throw new Error("No sitekey found");',
'    }',
'    return {',
'      success: true,',
'      data: {',
'        sitekey: capturedData.sitekey,',
'        action: capturedData.action || "login",',
'        pageurl: targetURL,',
'        cData: capturedData.cData,',
'        chlPageData: capturedData.chlPageData,',
'        rucaptcha: {',
'          method: "turnstile",',
'          sitekey: capturedData.sitekey,',
'          pageurl: targetURL,',
'          action: capturedData.action || "login",',
'          json: 1',
'        }',
'      }',
'    };',
'  } catch (err) {',
'    return { success: false, error: err.message };',
'  }',
'};'
].join('\n');

const requestBody = {
  code: code,
  context: {
    targetURL: $input.item.json.targetURL,
    waitTime: $input.item.json.waitTime
  }
};

return { 
  json: { 
    requestBody: requestBody,
    token: $input.item.json.browserlessToken 
  } 
};
